column2: ALPHA BLACK TO CHARLIE BLACK. HILL IS SECURE. PROCEED. OVER.
ALPHA BLACK TO DELTA BLACK. ATTACK THE OBJECTIVE NOW. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. FIRST RUINS HAVE BEEN CLEARED. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. LAST OBJECTIVE HAS BEEN SECURED. OVER.
CHARLIE BLACK TO ALPHA BLACK. ROGER ON OUR WAY. OVER.
THIS IS DELTA BLACK. ROGER THAT ALPHA BLACK. ENGAGING. DELTA OUT.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. THATS A COPY. PROCEED WITH THE MISSION PLAN AND CALL DELTA WHEN READY TO ATTACK. OVER.
PAPA BEAR COPIES. GOOD WORK EVERYONE. PAPA BEAR OUT.
